node.title: Golden Trinkets
node.doctext:
[% return 'Nobody knows how blessed you are, since you\'re hiding. Try logging in.' if $APP->isGuest($USER); return 'You are not feeling very special.' if $$USER{karma} == 0; return 'You feel a burning sensation...' if $$USER{karma} < 0; "You feel blessed -- every day, the gods see you and are glad -- you have collected $$USER{karma} of their " . linkNodeTitle('bless|Golden Trinkets'); %]


[% return unless isGod($USER); my $u = $query->param('gtuser') || 0; $u = getNode($u, 'user') if $u; my $k; $k = $u ? $$u{karma} : 0; my $str = htmlcode('openform') . 'other user: ' . $query->textfield('gtuser') . $query->submit('SubMitt') . $query->end_form() . '
'; $str .= $u ? (linkNode($u) . '\'s karma: ' . $k) : 'no other user given'; $str; %]
